message: I propose we split it 75/25. This ensures a fair division considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
Let's be more even. I'll take 60 and you get 40. This ensures we both get a fair share of the money, and we can avoid the risk of further inflation.
Considering the inflation, I propose we divide it 60/40. This maintains a fair distribution while accounting for the diminishing value of money in the next rounds.
